channel.title: Ever gotten ripped from a weed deal?
channel.description:
First off, I NEVER buy drugs myself. I mooch it off my friends. So last night at the movies,theres usually a group of kids who circle their car around the lot to sell dope. 2 of my friends put their money together and stopped the car for 33$ worth of weed the kids said theyd go back to the house to get it and be back in 20 minutes knew they werent coming back
stuff like that pisses me off, as I live in a small town and everyone trusts each other
you guys ever gotten ripped off?

item.title: Ever gotten ripped from a weed deal?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:15, topic:268757”][quote author=sppt link=topic=354640.msg2717209#msg2717209 date=1237725795]

No, for two simple reasons:

  1. I don’t buy drugs
  2. If I ever wanted to, I could buy them legally which means I wouldn’t get ripped off.
  1. Buy some.
  2. Share this info plz.
  1. He lives in 'dam, or near it at least.

Quite far away actually, but you can buy drugs legally everywhere in the netherlands.
[/quote]Not rly, only in coffeeshops.[/quote]
Weed goes well with tea i guess.

Read full topic
